official-title.#text: To provide that the President shall submit to Congress a report detailing the priority of Federal spending if the statutory debt limit is reached, and for other purposes.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: a report listing, in descending order of prioritization, which obligations of the United States Government will be paid in the event that the debt of the United States Government, as defined in

text.#text: Not later than 30 days after the date of enactment of this Act, the

external-xref.#tail: of title 31, United States Code, reaches the statutory limit.

header.#text: Priority of spending if the debt ceiling is reached

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 1231 IH: Transparency on Prioritizing Spending Act
